attributes.action: RIGHT TO BE EDUCATED BE I RICH OR BE I POOR
attributes.additional_details:
It should be the right of every child to recieve education regardless of whether their family can or can not afford to but a school uniform from a chosen francise, If a child is dressed smartly to the best of their finacial means in non offensive clothing, then that child should be entitled to be educated.
Too many children are be sent home for petty dracionion uniform polices, denying them education. Uniform promotes gang / club mentality we see on our streets now, rather than a mixed populas. The constant complaint of uneducated generations rings in our news programs. Schools spend vast amount of work hours thinking up obstructive polices rather than Educating our children this practice must stop. Schools should be teaching achedemic subjects non club/gang fashion. Give them every chance to develop a sense of worth to society, not to draw lines of our gang/club. ITS OUR's AND THEIR FUTURE
